info.title: SqlManagementClient
info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases, servers, and other entities.

get.description: Gets a list of job agents in a server.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of job agents.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

get.description: Gets a job agent.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent to be retrieved.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the specified job agent.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

put.description: Creates or updates a job agent.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent to be created or updated.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The requested job agent resource state.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidResourceRequestBody - The resource or resource properties in the request body is empty or invalid.

 * 400 MissingSkuName - Sku name is required.

 * 400 InvalidDatabaseResourceId - Invalid database resource identifier.

 * 400 MismatchingSubscriptionWithUrl - The provided subscription did not match the subscription in the Url.

 * 400 MismatchingResourceGroupNameWithUrl - The provided resource group name did not match the name in the Url.

 * 400 MismatchingServerNameWithUrl - The provided server name did not match the name in the Url.

 * 400 DatabaseDoesNotExist - The requested database was not found

 * 400 JobAgentExceededQuota - Could not create job agent because it would exceed the quota.

 * 400 JobAgentAlreadyExists - The job agent already exists on the server.

 * 400 JobAgentDatabaseEditionUnsupported - The specified database's service level objective is not supported for use as a job agent database.

 * 400 JobAgentDatabaseSecondary - A job agent cannot be linked to a geo-secondary database.

 * 400 JobAgentDatabaseAlreadyLinked - The specified database is already linked to another job agent.

 * 400 CannotUseReservedDatabaseName - Cannot use reserved database name in this operation.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 SubscriptionNotFound - The requested subscription was not found.

 * 404 PropertyChangeUnsupported - Property cannot be modified.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent to be deleted.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

204.description: The specified job agent does not exist.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent to be updated.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The update to the job agent.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidResourceRequestBody - The resource or resource properties in the request body is empty or invalid.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 PropertyChangeUnsupported - Property cannot be modified.

get.description: Gets a list of jobs credentials.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of job credentials.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

get.description: Gets a jobs credential.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: credentialName
parameters.description: The name of the credential.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

put.description: Creates or updates a job credential.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: credentialName
parameters.description: The name of the credential.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The requested job credential state.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidResourceRequestBody - The resource or resource properties in the request body is empty or invalid.

 * 400 InvalidJobCredentialUsername - Invalid credential username.

 * 403 JobCredentialPermissionError - Azure Resource Manager does not have permission to use or manage the credential.

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: credentialName
parameters.description: The name of the credential.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 403 JobCredentialPermissionError - Azure Resource Manager does not have permission to use or manage the credential.

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

204.description: A credential with the specified name does not exist.

get.description: Lists all executions in a job agent.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: createTimeMin
parameters.description: If specified, only job executions created at or after the specified time are included.

parameters.name: createTimeMax
parameters.description: If specified, only job executions created before the specified time are included.

parameters.name: endTimeMin
parameters.description: If specified, only job executions completed at or after the specified time are included.

parameters.name: endTimeMax
parameters.description: If specified, only job executions completed before the specified time are included.

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: If specified, only active or only completed job executions are included.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of elements in the collection to skip.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of elements to return from the collection.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

post.description: Requests cancellation of a job execution.

parameters.name: jobAgentName
parameters.description: The name of the job agent.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: The name of the job.

parameters.name: jobExecutionId
parameters.description: The id of the job execution to cancel.

200.description: Successfully requested cancellation of the job execution.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

put.description: Creates or updates a job step. This will implicitly create a new job version.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The requested state of the job step.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 JobStepIdMismatch - Step Id in the specified Job Step URI does not match step id in provided Job Step Resource.

 * 400 InvalidResourceRequestBody - The resource or resource properties in the request body is empty or invalid.

 * 400 InvalidResourceId - Invalid resource identifier.

 * 400 MismatchingSubscriptionWithUrl - The provided subscription did not match the subscription in the Url.

 * 400 MismatchingResourceGroupNameWithUrl - The provided resource group name did not match the name in the Url.

 * 400 MismatchingServerNameWithUrl - The provided server name did not match the name in the Url.

 * 400 MismatchingJobAccountNameWithUrl - The provided job account name did not match the name in the Url.

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 400 ElasticJobsOperationFailed - Elastic jobs management operation failed.

 * 404 JobAgentNotFound - Specified job agent does not exist in the specified logical server.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotHaveServer - The requested server was not found

JobAgentListResult.description: A list of Azure SQL job agents.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

databaseId.description: Resource ID of the database to store job metadata in.

state.description: The state of the job agent.

sku.description: The name and tier of the SKU.

JobAgentUpdate.description: An update to an Azure SQL job agent.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

JobCredential.description: A stored credential that can be used by a job to connect to target databases.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

JobExecutionProperties.description: Properties for an Azure SQL Database Elastic job execution.

jobExecutionId.description: The unique identifier of the job execution.

lifecycle.description: The detailed state of the job execution.

provisioningState.description: The ARM provisioning state of the job execution.

createTime.description: The time that the job execution was created.

startTime.description: The time that the job execution started.

endTime.description: The time that the job execution completed.

currentAttempts.description: Number of times the job execution has been attempted.

currentAttemptStartTime.description: Start time of the current attempt.

lastMessage.description: The last status or error message.

target.description: The target that this execution is executed on.

JobExecutionTarget.description: The target that a job execution is executed on.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

enabled.description: Whether or not the schedule is enabled.

interval.description: Value of the schedule's recurring interval, if the schedule type is recurring. ISO8601 duration format.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

stepId.description: The job step's index within the job. If not specified when creating the job step, it will be created as the last step. If not specified when updating the job step, the step id is not modified.

targetGroup.description: The resource ID of the target group that the job step will be executed on.

credential.description: The resource ID of the job credential that will be used to connect to the targets.

action.description: The action payload of the job step.

output.description: Output destination properties of the job step.

executionOptions.description: Execution options for the job step.

JobStepAction.description: The action to be executed by a job step.

type.description: Type of action being executed by the job step.

source.description: The source of the action to execute.

value.description: The action value, for example the text of the T-SQL script to execute.

JobStepOutput.description: The output configuration of a job step.

credential.description: The resource ID of the credential to use to connect to the output destination.

JobStepExecutionOptions.description: The execution options of a job step.

timeoutSeconds.description: Execution timeout for the job step.

retryAttempts.description: Maximum number of times the job step will be reattempted if the first attempt fails.

initialRetryIntervalSeconds.description: Initial delay between retries for job step execution.

maximumRetryIntervalSeconds.description: The maximum amount of time to wait between retries for job step execution.

retryIntervalBackoffMultiplier.description: The backoff multiplier for the time between retries.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

JobTarget.description: A job target, for example a specific database or a container of databases that is evaluated during job execution.

membershipType.description: Whether the target is included or excluded from the group.

refreshCredential.description: The resource ID of the credential that is used during job execution to connect to the target and determine the list of databases inside the target.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

ManagedInstanceNameParameter.name: managedInstanceName
ManagedInstanceNameParameter.description: The name of the managed instance.

BlobAuditingPolicyNameParameter.name: blobAuditingPolicyName
BlobAuditingPolicyNameParameter.description: The name of the blob auditing policy.

VirtualClusterNameParameter.name: virtualClusterName
VirtualClusterNameParameter.description: The name of the virtual cluster.
